mapper.select: SELECT name, position, m1, m2, all1 FROM end_score WHERE collegeId = #{collegeId} AND year = (SELECT value FROM some_message WHERE name = 'year');

SELECT s1.jobNumber, s1.endScore AS endScore1, s2.endScore AS endScore2, s2.teachScore FROM semester1 AS s1 INNER JOIN semester2 AS s2 ON s1.jobNumber = s2.jobNumber WHERE s1.year = #{year} AND s2.year = #{year};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO end_score SELECT null, jobNumber, name, position, collegeId, #{endScore1} * #{endScore1MUL} + #{endScore2} * #{endScore2MUL}, #{teachScore} * #{teachScoreMUL}, (#{endScore1} * #{endScore1MUL} + #{endScore2} * #{endScore2MUL}) * #{m1MUL} + (#{teachScore} * #{teachScoreMUL}) * #{m2MUL}, #{year}, #{date} FROM semester1 WHERE year = #{year} AND jobNumber = #{jobNumber};
